events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster as they are requesting money back due to an incorrect delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the order with incorrect items.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the problem quickly?
Here is my order number 12345678 and attached is the photo showing the wrong item received instead of the product I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund solution. I appreciate the help and will send back the wrong item promptly.
Your refund has been initiated and the return label emailed. Please ship back the incorrect item at your earliest convenience.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and to check if you need further assistance with anything else.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no additional issues were reported, we are closing this support case now.
We have sent a brief satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
